data.why:
A part-of-speech tagger for German texts. The tagger uses a bi-gram
    hidden markov model and two lexical resources that are downloaded
    during the first use of the tagger. The tagger will accept raw text
    and returns an xml-style tagged text that uses the standard
    Stuttgard/TÃ¼bingen TagSet. From the tagged text, a wordlist can be
    generated according to the user's preferences - for instance, a list
    of nouns or noun phrases for use in indexing a text collection.
